title: r/Entitledparents "I Have Kids, So Pay for My $3,000 Vacation!"
description: r/Entitledparents In today's episode, OP is happily childfree, which of course means that he's able to save more money. His friends, however, decided to have kids so they're frequently strapped for cash. OP has been saving money for months to go on a long vacation. When his entitled-parent friends find out about that, they demand that OP gives them $3,000 so they can have a vacation of their own. Fat chance!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
